mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ML_TOOL_BASIC_ELEMENT ( ID, ELEMENT_NAME, ELEMENT_KEY, IS_REQUIRED, IS_READONLY, IS_OVERLAP, ELEMENT_LENGTH, HTML_CONTROL, CONTROL_TYPE, RELATED_CONTROL, API_URI, REQUEST_PARAMETER, CONTROL_VALUE, NUMBER_MIN, NUMBER_MAX, NUMBER_STEP, DEFAULT_VALUE, CLASSIFICATION_ID, SORT_CODE, ISDEL, TENANT, TMS, VNO, TXN_ITT_CHNL_CGY_CODE, TXN_ITT_CHNL_ID, DAC_VERF ) VALUES ( #{id} , #{elementName} , #{elementKey} , #{isRequired} , #{isReadonly} , #{isOverlap} , #{elementLength} , #{htmlControl} , #{controlType} , #{relatedControl} , #{apiUri} , #{requestParameter} , #{controlValue} , #{numberMin} , #{numberMax} , #{numberStep} , #{defaultValue} , #{classificationId} , #{sortCode} , #{isdel} , #{tenant} , #{tms} , #{vno} , #{txnIttChnlCgyCode} , #{txnIttChnlId} , #{dacVerf} )
